mapper.insert: insert into t_gps_snapshot (device_code, alarm_status, vehicle_status, lat, lon, height, speed, direction, time, mile, oil, speed2, signal_status, bst, io_status, analog, wifi, satellite_num, create_time, vendor_code, heartbeat_time, bst_time, location_time, alarm_time, protocol_type, wrt_acc_status, wrt_bast_status, wrt_tear_status, wrt_work_status, wrt_manual_bast, wrt_auto_bast, wrt_autobast_time, wrt_power_status, wrt_opower_status, wrt_move_status, wrt_alarm_status, wrt_heart_frequency, wrt_gps_frequency) values (#{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mile,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{signalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ioStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{analog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wifi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{satelliteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vendorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{heartbeatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bstTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{locationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtAccStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtBastStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtTearStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtWorkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtManualBast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtAutoBast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtAutobastTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wrtPowerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtOpowerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtMoveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtAlarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wrtHeartFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wrtGpsFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_gps_snapshot set alarm_status = #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_status = #{vehicleStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, height = #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed = #{speed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mile = #{mile,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oil = #{oil,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, speed2 = #{speed2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, signal_status = #{signalStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bst = #{bst,jdbcType=INTEGER}, io_status = #{ioStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, analog = #{analog,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wifi = #{wifi,jdbcType=INTEGER}, satellite_num = #{satelliteNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vendor_code = #{vendorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, heartbeat_time = #{heartbeatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bst_time = #{bstTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, location_time = #{locationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, protocol_type = #{protocolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_acc_status = #{wrtAccStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_bast_status = #{wrtBastStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_tear_status = #{wrtTearStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_work_status = #{wrtWorkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_manual_bast = #{wrtManualBast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_auto_bast = #{wrtAutoBast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_autobast_time = #{wrtAutobastTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wrt_power_status = #{wrtPowerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_opower_status = #{wrtOpowerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_move_status = #{wrtMoveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_alarm_status = #{wrtAlarmStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wrt_heart_frequency = #{wrtHeartFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wrt_gps_frequency = #{wrtGpsFrequency,jdbcType=INTEGER} where device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select device_code, alarm_status, vehicle_status, lat, lon, height, speed, direction, time, mile, oil, speed2, signal_status, bst, io_status, analog, wifi, satellite_num, create_time, vendor_code, heartbeat_time, bst_time, location_time, alarm_time, protocol_type, wrt_acc_status, wrt_bast_status, wrt_tear_status, wrt_work_status, wrt_manual_bast, wrt_auto_bast, wrt_autobast_time, wrt_power_status, wrt_opower_status, wrt_move_status, wrt_alarm_status, wrt_heart_frequency, wrt_gps_frequency from t_gps_snapshot where device_code = #{deviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
